General.Name: ACM Research Shanghai Inc
General.Description: ACM Research (Shanghai), Inc. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of semiconductor equipment in China and internationally. It offers semiconductor cleaning equipment, polishing equipment, vertical furnace tube equipment, pre-coating and developing equipment, semiconductor electroplating equipment, advanced packaging equipment, and wafer fabrication equipment. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shanghai, China. ACM Research (Shanghai), Inc. is a subsidiary of ACM Research, Inc.
